elements.title: What is your full name?
elements.description: Use the name as it is written on your primary ID cards. This name will be the most useful.
elements.descFirstName: First Name is also known as Given Name
elements.descMiddleName: If you have more than one Middle Name, write them all in this box with spaces separating your Middle Names
elements.descLastName: Last Name is also known as Family Name or Surname

elements.title: What is your date of birth?

elements.name: Lawyer
elements.title: Has a lawyer agreed to receive court documents for you?
elements.description: You do not need a lawyer to use this service.  If you have a lawyer, you can still use this service.

elements.name: FAQLawyer1
elements.title: What if I plan to get a lawyer but I haven't done that yet?
elements.body:
You do not have a lawyer that has agreed to receive court documents for you.

After you get your lawyer, they may help you change the address for receiving court documents to their address.
